constraints.name: rectangular_area_effect
constraints.description: 选择一个矩形区域，将该区域内的所有元素变为同一值（白色）
constraints.formal: For a chosen (i, j), set all cells (i', j') to white where i ≤ i' ≤ i + k - 1 and j ≤ j' ≤ j + k - 1

constraints.name: line_whiteness
constraints.description: 行或列中没有黑色元素时，该行或列为白色线
constraints.formal: A line is white if it contains no black cells
